text: John Warren Goodson is a former professional American football player who played punter for one season for the Pittsburgh Steelers. He is known for punting barefoot.https://www.pro-football-reference.com/players/G/GoodJo22.htm ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:American football punters Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:Texas Longhorns football players Category:Sportspeople from Houston Category:Players of American football from Texas
title: John Goodson
